history: 2020-01-02 (0.3.0): major rewrite of the processimage service, rendered web pages show links to IPTC standard
2019-12-27 (0.2.3): minor edits prior to a major rewrite of the processing of metadata
2019-04-01: accessing config files got a path.join with __dir, appversion moved to config directory
2017-12-31: up/download of image files limited to about 70kBytes = faster
